channel.description: Recent content in Posts on AC Notes Blog

item.title: Setup Proxy on DockerCE
item.author: aaron0219@gmail.com (Aaron)
item.description: üåµTo make DockerCE can access internet through proxy server. Linux: Ubuntu 20.04 Docker: 19.03.12 üå¥Setup proxy on DockerCE 1. Create a folder In following location mkdir /etc/systemd/system/docker.service.d 2. Create a configure file The file name: http-proxy.conf vi http-proxy.conf Add the following value [Service] Environment="HTTP_PROXY=<ip>:<port>" Environment="HTTPS_PROXY=<ip>:<port>" Environment="NO_PROXY=localhost,127.0.0.1,localaddress,.localdomain.com" 3. Restart the daemon and DockerCE sudo systemctl daemon-reload sudo systemctl restart docker END

item.title: How to Build Up Hexo Blog and deploy to Github
item.author: aaron0219@gmail.com (Aaron)
item.description: üçÖEasy and sample build up Hexo Blog and delpoy to Github. Just a note for this blog build up. git: 2.18.4-2.el8_2 git: 2.24.1.windows.2 hexo: 5.2.0 hexo-cli: 4.2.0 CentOS: 8.2.2004 Windows: 10 1909 üçêInstall 1. Verify git, node and npm git --version node -v npm -v 2. Upgrade npm version (option) npm install npm -g 3. Install hexo-cli hexo-admin npm install hexo-cli hexo-admin -g 4. Check hexo hexo version üçëConfigure Hexo 1.

item.title: Use Github Actions to Deploy Hugo Blog
item.author: aaron0219@gmail.com (Aaron)
item.description: üåïBuild up Hugo Blog to Github Page Auto. git: 2.18.4-2.el8_2 git: 2.24.1.windows.2 hugo: v0.75.1 ‚òÄÔ∏èGithub setting 1. Create a Github account Goto Github for sign up a account 2. Create Personal access tokens Create a personal access tokens for deploy github pages i. In main page, Goto Settings ii. Select Developer settings, then select Personal access tokens iii. Click Generate new token button iv. Type Note and select repo:status & public_repo only, then Click Update token

item.title: How to Build Up Hugo Blog
item.author: aaron0219@gmail.com (Aaron)
item.description: üê∞Easy and sample build up Hugo Blog. Just a note for this blog build up. git: 2.18.4-2.el8_2 git: 2.24.1.windows.2 hugo: v0.75.1 CentOS: 8.2.2004 Windows: 10 1909 üêπInstall Hugo 1. Verify git git --version 2. Download Hugo and install i. Windonws Goto https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases Download the last version of hugo for windows (hugo_0.XX.X_Windows-64bit.zip) Unzip the exe file to C:\hugo In CMD, Enter following: pathman /au c:\hugo ii. Ubuntu
